resources.string: Add title for your word list
You need title for your words list
You need at least 9 words for list
You need to write your word inside field
You are missing value for this cell
You need to add words for your bingo games ^_^
This app was created in my very limited free time for my friends. You can always contact me or leave comment. I hope You have fun ;-)

Long clicking on tile will display text in it 
 
 Single click marks tile. Click again to un-mark this tile 
 
 If You want to use 5x5 board for game your word list will need to have at least 24 words or expressions 
 
 Words are always randomly picked from whole your list

In Edit Mode every new value should be at start of list with name "0. You should change this" 
 
 Clicking on tile in middle of 5x5 board will load image into it for extreme game experience ^_^ 
 
 You can generate pseudo-random numbers when viewing your saved words list. 
 
 Click on "pick random value" from menu to show or hide draw button.
Saved new list with random numbers
You can write here word number:
